title.rendered: Macallan 25 Year Old Anniversary Malt Sherry Oak in Red Box

content.rendered: One of life’s few genuinely incomparable pleasures. A special bottling of unblended single highland malt scotch whisky 25 years old. In the heart of Speyside, in the region known as Glenlivet, stands the Macallan Distillery. The site of Whisky making for many generations, it was accorded legal status in 1824, and since then it has been the home of Scotland’s finest Malt Whisky.

excerpt.rendered:
Volume: 750 ML
Category: Vintage & Rare, Single Malts
Distillery: Macallan
Region: Speyside
Age: 25 Year Old
ABV: 43.0%
